pages.text:
[To be published in the Gazette of India, Extraordinary, Part II, Section 3, Sub-section (i)]
Government of India
Ministry of Finance
Department of Revenue
Central Board of Excise and Customs
Notification No. 52/2017 – Central Tax
New Delhi, the 28th October, 2017
G.S.R. …..(E). In pursuance of section 168 of the Central Goods and Services Tax Act, 2017 (12 of
2017) (hereafter referred to as the said Act) and clause (b) of sub-rule (1) of rule 40 of the Central
Goods and Services Tax Rules, 2017, the Central Government hereby makes the following
amendments in the notification number 44/2017-Central Tax, dated the 13th October, 2017, published
in the Gazette of India, Extraordinary, Part II, Section 3, sub-section (i), vide number G.S.R. 1258 (E),
dated the 13th October, 2017, namely:-
In the said notification, for the words, figures and letters “the 31st day of October, 2017”, the
words, figures and letters “the 30th day of November, 2017”shall be substituted.
[F. No.349/58/2017-GST(Pt.II)]
(Dr. Sreeparvathy S.L.)
Under Secretary to Government of India
Note:- The principal rules were published in the Gazette of India, Extraordinary, Part II,
Section 3, sub-section (i) vide notification No. 44/2017-Central Tax, dated the 13th October, 2017,
published vide number G.S.R. 1258 (E), dated the 13th October, 2017.
